caption: Policy Analysis
description: The Policy Analysis object describes details about the analysis performed on a Policy i.e. AWS IAM Policy, GCP IAM Policy, etc.
name: policy_analysis

condition_keys.description: The condition keys that were evaluated in the policy. E.g. aws:SourceIp:1.2.3.4

granted_actions.description: The actions that were granted by the policy.

policy.description: Details about the policy that was the subject of the analysis.

unused_actions_count.description: The number of unused actions in the policy.

unused_services_count.description: The number of unused services in the policy. E.g. AWS S3, SQS, IAM etc.
